name: Digital Desperado (BigHandInSky)
description:
You, the goal, and a level filled with targets awaiting, how fast can you run the level? Digital Desperado is a Speedrunning-focused FPS, you only have your trusty railgun to point and shoot, levels of possibilities, and the clock ticking, featuring 17 levels, a tutorial, sandbox to play in, and a packed soundtrack, featuring music by Debmaster, including "Ah Oui" and "Cervelet", with Models by Gubbadub where we'll be adding in all forms of buildings and such in the future.

If you liked the soundtrack, the albums they are from here:

  • http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Debmaster/Crev/
  • http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Fancy_Mike/STOP_2X2_04/
  • http://freemusicarchive.org/music/The_Cow_Goes_Moo/Super_Spongiform_People_1909
  • http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Various_Artists_Ancient_Robot/The_Rootkit_1710
